hanzi-su-wiki:
頑

Значения

Упрямый, упорный; сильный, крепкий; тугодум

Мнемоника

Думать головой 頁, как и ранее 元, настаивать на своём.

Варианты

顽
purpleculture_pinyin:
wán
mischievous; obstinate; to play; stupid; stubborn; naughty
озорной; упрямый; играть; глупый; упрямый; непослушный

purpleculture_examples:
頑強 [ wán qiáng ]: tenacious; hard to defeat
頑固 [ wán gù ]: stubborn; obstinate
頑皮 [ wán pí ]: naughty
頑症 [ wán zhèng ]: stubborn illness; disease that is difficult to treat
頑童 [ wán tóng ]: urchin

heisig_chinese_memo: A stubborn person in the beginning gets something into their head and can't change their mind.
heisig_constituent: stubborn, beginning, two, human legs, head, page, one, ceiling, drop, shellfish, clam, oyster, eye, animal legs, eight
heisig_story: This character refers to the blockheaded, persistent stubbornness of one who sticks to an idea or a plan just the way it was at the beginning, without letting anything that comes up along the way alter things in the least. The explanation makes "sense," but is hard to remember because the word "beginning "is too abstract. Back up to the image we used two frames ago - Adam and Eve in their Eden - and try again: The root of all stubbornness goes back to the beginning, with two brothers each stubbornly defending his own way of life and asking their God to bless it favorably. Abel stuck to agriculture, Cain to animal-raising. Picture these two with their giant, swelled heads, each vying for the favors of heaven, a stubborn grimace on their faces. No wonder something unfortunate happened!
koohiiStory1: A stubborn person in the beginning gets something into their head and can´t change their mind.
koohiiStory2: Picture a STUBBORN schoolboy, with his arms crossed and his book still open to the BEGINNING PAGE. Despite the teacher telling him to turn the page, he refuses and keeps his book on the BEGINNING PAGE.
jp_example_words:
頑固(がんこ): stubbornness, obstinacy
頑丈(がんじょう): solid, firm, stout, burly, strong, sturdy
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: The origin of the geoduck is a pretty stubborn one. The geoduck race is so stubborn that it refused to evolve into an animal that made any sense. Hence, the origin of the geoduck is one of stubbornness.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: You know what a geoduck looks like, right? Does that look like a creature that was looking to change and evolve and be awesome? No, geoducks are weird and stubborn. Imagine how stubborn you’d have to be to not want to evolve into a more attractive animal.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You know who else was stubborn? Gandhi (がん). Gandhi believed in non-violent resistance and he was pretty stubborn about it.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Gandhi’s stubbornness, however, was pretty effective. Everyone knows Gandhi. Remember Gandhi and his famous stubborn attitude whenever you see this kanji.
Ru_Notes: Не путать: 玩 (もちあそぶ、ガン игрушка, играть).
Ru_Radicals: 二 (два), 儿 (ножки), ハ, 元 (начало), 目 (глаз), 貝 (раковина), 頁 (страница)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the original (元) page (頁) is stubborn
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Here is the weird shellfish again with a page still on his head.  He is so stubborn, he rejects anyone's suggestion to lose the paper from the very beginning of their reasoning.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " page ", " yuan " sound, the original meaning is a round wood that is difficult to split. "Shuowen": "Watou also. From the page, Yuansheng." Tang Yuanzhen, "Painted Pine": "The fiber branches are not cool, the stubborn empty space is abrupt."

" Stubborn " can mean foolishness. "Shu‧ Yaodian": "Father is stubborn, mother is stubborn, like proud." Kong Chuan: "If the heart is not, the scripture of virtue and righteousness is stubborn."

" Stubborn " also means ferocious. "Shu‧Yiji": "Miao is stubborn, and it is work." Kong Chuan: "But San Miao is stubborn and fierce.

" Stubborn " also means strong and hard. Tang Hanyu's "Pinghuaixi Stele": "Cai Shuaizhi is not awarded by the court. In this 50 years, he has three surnames and four generals. The tree is strong and the soldiers are stubborn. Don't wait with him."

" Stubborn " can mean numbness and slow movement. Song Su Shi "Send Zhang Tian to Feel the Mountain Characters": "I am also old and ill, dizzy and stubborn."
humanum_short_description_en: From " page ", " yuan " sound, the original meaning is a round wood that is difficult to split.
humanum_full_description:
從「頁」，「元」聲，本義為難以劈開的囫圇木頭。《說文》：「㮯頭也。从頁，元聲。」 唐元稹〈畫松〉：「纖枝無瀟灑，頑幹空突兀。」

　　「頑」可表示愚頑。《書‧堯典》：「父頑，母嚚，象傲。」孔傳：「心不則德義之經為頑。」

　　「頑」還表示凶惡。《書‧益稷》：「苗頑，弗即工。」孔傳：「惟三苗頑凶，不得就官。」

　　「頑」亦表示堅強、堅硬。唐韓愈〈平淮西碑〉：「蔡帥之不廷授，于今五十年，傳三姓四將，其樹本堅，兵利卒頑，不與他等。」

　　「頑」可指麻木、動作遲鈍。宋蘇軾〈送張天覺得山字〉：「我亦老且病，眼花腰腳頑。」
humanum_short_description: 從「頁」，「元」聲，本義為難以劈開的囫圇木頭。

從「 頁 」，「 元 」聲，本義為難以劈開的囫圇木頭。《說文》：「㮯頭也。从頁，元聲。」 唐元稹〈畫松〉：「纖枝無瀟灑，頑幹空突兀。」 「 頑 」可表示愚頑。《書‧堯典》：「父頑，母嚚，象傲。」孔傳：「心不則德義之經為頑。」 「 頑 」還表示凶惡。《書‧益稷》：「苗頑，弗即工。」孔傳：「惟三苗頑凶，不得就官。」 「 頑 」亦表示堅強、堅硬。唐韓愈〈平淮西碑〉：「蔡帥之不廷授，于今五十年，傳三姓四將，其樹本堅，兵利卒頑，不與他等。」 「 頑 」可指麻木、動作遲鈍。宋蘇軾〈送張天覺得山字〉：「我亦老且病，眼花腰腳頑。」

"Shu‧ Yaodian": "Father is stubborn, mother is stubborn, like proud." Kong Chuan: "If the heart is not, the scripture of virtue and righteousness is stubborn." " Stubborn" also means ferocious. "Shu‧Yiji": "Miao is stubborn, and it is work." Kong Chuan: "But San Miao is stubborn and fierce. " Stubborn" also means strong and hard. Tang Hanyu's "Pinghuaixi Stele": "Cai Shuaizhi is not awarded by the court. In this 50 years, he has three surnames and four generals. The tree is strong and the soldiers are stubborn. Don't wait with him." " Stubborn" can mean numbness and slow movement. Song Su Shi "Send Zhang Tian to Feel the Mountain Characters": "I am also old and ill, dizzy and stubborn."

頑字的基本解释

頑
wán
见“顽”。

頑字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wán］
［《廣韻》五還切，平删，疑。］
“顽1”的繁体字。
(1)未劈开的囫囵木头。
(2)引申为浑圆。
(3)愚妄；愚顽。
(4)指愚妄、愚顽的人。
(5)凶恶。
(6)指凶恶的人。旧时对某些民族的蔑称。
(7)坚强；坚硬。
(8)坚持，不懈怠。
(9)颜色等深、浓。
(10)厚，老。
(11)麻木，动作迟钝。
(12)顽敌；顽固派。
(13)通“玩”。玩弄；玩赏。
(14)通“玩”。嬉戏；游玩。
(15)通“忨”。贪婪。

頑字的康熙字典解释

【戌集下】【頁字部】　頑； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页1401第04
【唐韻】【集韻】【正韻】五還切【韻會】魚鰥切，?刖平聲。【說文】㨡頭也。从頁元聲。【玉篇】鈍也。【廣韻】愚也。【韻會】癡也。【書·堯典】父頑母嚚。【左傳·僖二十四年】心不則德義之經爲頑。　又人名。【左傳·成十年】鄭人立髠頑。【註】髠頑，鄭成公子。　又古通文韻，魚雲切，音輑。【蘇軾·祭韓琦文】援手拯溺，期我于仁。豈知無用，旣老益頑。　又古通元韻。虞袁切，音涓。【白居易·悟眞寺詩】及爲山水遊，彌得縱疎頑。野麋斷羈絆，行走無拘攣。

頑字的源字形

小篆楷体

頑字的起名意思

暂无。

Name meaning

wán, kūn
вм. 顽
Radicals: 元, 頁  (origin, geoduck)
Meaning Mnemonic
The origin of the geoduck is a pretty stubborn one. The geoduck race is so stubborn that it refused to evolve into an animal that made any sense. Hence, the origin of the geoduck is one of stubbornness.
You know what a geoduck looks like, right? Does that look like a creature that was looking to change and evolve and be awesome? No, geoducks are weird and stubborn. Imagine how stubborn you’d have to be to not want to evolve into a more attractive animal.
Reading Mnemonic
You know who else was stubborn? Gandhi (がん). Gandhi believed in non-violent resistance and he was pretty stubborn about it.
Gandhi’s stubbornness, however, was pretty effective. Everyone knows Gandhi. Remember Gandhi and his famous stubborn attitude whenever you see this kanji.
